issues.name: “Old Man Jenkins!?”
issues.description: Special: Before a base scores, destroy a minion with the highest power there. FAQ

issues.name: That’s So Crazy...
issues.description: Draw a Madness card. Each of your minions has +1 power until the end of the turn. You may play an extra action this turn. FAQ

issues.name: IT’S ALIVE!
issues.description: Play an extra minion. Place a +1 power counter on it. FAQ
